'''''Firland in Flames''''' is the third book in the fantasy series [[The Firland Saga]], inspired by the fictional works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. "Firland in Flames" is a translation of the Danish title, ''Firland i flammer'' (the book appears to have only been published in Denmark).<ref>Henrik Larsen, "Landet du ikke kan nå" ("The Country You cannot Reach"), published in ''Obskuriøst'' nr. 5/6, June 2003. Further elaborations by the same author in "[http://www.cultmovies.dk/obskur/firland.htm Firland - om en særdeles obskuriøs bogserie]" (web page, as of July 18, 2010)</ref>
